BRIDGE.name: Bridge of the Enterprise
BRIDGE.desc: You are standing on the bridge of the Enterprise. Lt. Commander Data is at Ops, and Wesley has the helm. Mr. Worf is barking something about Romulans, blah blah blah. You are intrigued about the conversation but decide to mind your own buisness.

READYROOM.name: Captain's Ready Room
READYROOM.desc: You are in the captain's ready room.  It is a dark room with lots of space. Captain Picard is seated behind his desk, sipping an Earl Grey tea, hot. He looks stern and has a neutral facial expression.

items.desc: A type 1 phaser is on the captain's desk. You are tempted to take it.
items.take: You take the phaser while the captain isn't looking and slip it into your pocket... Oh, wait, your uniform doesn't have pockets. Looks like you have to hold it and sprint out before the captain notices.

FRONT DECK.name: Front Deck of ship
FRONT DECK.desc: You are at the front deck of the ship. The ship jerks and you grab onto the railing for support.

BEDROOM.name: Private Bedroom
BEDROOM.desc: You are in your personal bedroom. The bed is made and there is a small lamp on a side table.

CONTROL ROOM.name: Control Room
CONTROL ROOM.desc: You have entered into the control room. Many noises are coming from the machines and you look at all the supplies.

KITCHEN.name: Ship Kitchen
KITCHEN.desc: You are in the ship's kitchen. You open the cabinets looking for something to eat. You see a bag of chips.

LOUNGE.name: Ship Lounge
LOUNGE.desc: You are in the ship's lounge. You sit down on a sofa and relax. While you relax, you notice a small object in the corner of the room.
